query-mapping.description: The list of answers associated with a question.

property.name: user_rating
property.comment: the question rating as voted by the current user.

query.name: answer-list
query.sql: SELECT a.id, a.create_date, a.edit_date, a.answer, coalesce(r.rating,0) as rank, coalesce(v.rating,0), a.author_id, u.name, email.email FROM awa_answer AS a INNER JOIN awa_user AS u ON a.author_id = u.id INNER JOIN awa_email AS email ON a.author_id = email.user_id LEFT JOIN awa_rating AS r ON r.for_entity_id = a.id AND r.for_entity_type = $entity_type[awa_answer] LEFT JOIN awa_vote AS v ON v.entity_id = r.id AND v.user_id = :user_id WHERE a.question_id = :question_id ORDER BY rank DESC, a.create_date DESC
